constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 81 (Tuesday, May 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of Nebraska:
H.R. 3120.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 4 of the Constitution provides
that Congress shall have power ``To establish a uniform Rule
of Naturalization.''
[Page H2196]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: UAC State Notification Act of 2021
